pages.text: Medieval Times is based upon authentic Medieval history and is the true story of a noble family with documentation dating back to the 11th Century.

For The Media
Thank you for your interest in Medieval Times Dinner and Tournament!
If you have any questions, would like to schedule an interview, or see the show, please contact us anytime. Our corporate and local teams are eager to work with members of the media and look forward to seeing you at one of our castles!
5020 Riverside Drive
Building 3, Suite 400
Irving, TX 75039
(214) 596-7600
Contact us for more information
Fill out the following form, and we'll be in touch, or e-mail us directly at communications@medievaltimes.com
